description: Main entry point and core app widget for a Flutter-based finance tracking application. Sets up routing, theme, and bottom navigation across various screens such as dashboard, transactions, budget, categories, and account. Implements state management with Riverpod.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application managing theme and routing. Uses Riverpod's ConsumerWidget to reactively update the UI based on authentication state.

classes.name: MainNavigation
classes.description: Stateful widget managing bottom navigation bar and screen switching between main sections of the app.

classes.name: _MainNavigationState
classes.description: State class maintaining the current selected tab index and handling UI updates.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, initializes the app within a ProviderScope for Riverpod.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MyApp and _MainNavigationState, constructing MaterialApp and Scaffold with bottom navigation, applying theme and routing logic.

methods.name: _onItemTapped
methods.description: Updates the selected index in the bottom navigation bar to switch screens.
